Subject: Need to Filter corporate Mail and create custom alert
Description: Need to allow speciic mail for upload and block others. Also need to create cutom alert.
What_We_Know__c:
28/05/2025
Client needs to allow specific mails to upload and block other mails and also wants to create custom alerts.

03/06/2025
Connected remote with Sabeesh to take a  look at the case.
He wants to prevent users from accessing other domains than their business one using GMAIL.
Advised on how to use the CAP->DPI Allowed business accounts option and added their domain there.
We tested afterwards on a machine and it was blocking other domains without a problem.
Closing ticket.
Solution_Comment__c:
Issue was solved after adding the work domain on CAP->DPI->Allowed business accounts.

Tested on a machine and the gmail.com domain for personal mail was blocked accordingly.
